definition: right/correct/couple/pair/towards/at/for/to face/opposite/to treat (sb a certain way)/to match together/to adjust/to fit/to suit/to answer/to reply/classifier: couple
nature/character/property/quality/attribute/sexuality/sex/gender/suffix forming adjective from verb/suffix forming noun from adjective, corresponding to -ness or -ity/essence/CL:個|个[ge4]

sentences.english: Discuss the effectiveness of sexual abstinence programs in the fight against STDS.
sentences.chinese: 讨论在对抗性传播疾病中节制性活动的效力。

sentences.english: Avoid confrontational behaviour or high- pressure tactics.
sentences.chinese: 力戒对抗性的举动或高压策略。

sentences.english: Crystal, likes to play challenging games in lady doubles, and mixed doubles.
sentences.chinese: 喜欢打有对抗性的女双，混双。

sentences.english: Discuss the non-resistance Policy in the "September Eighteenth Incident";
sentences.chinese: 南非报纸批评美国对抗性外交政策。

sentences.english: Sanshou is one of the antagonistic events in, Wushu. Fighting is its intrinsic quality.
sentences.chinese: 散手是武术对抗性项目之一，技击是武术的本质属性。

sentences.english: This paper talks about the related problems with resistant term sports training through the net.
sentences.chinese: 本文对隔网对抗性项群运动训练的相关问题加以论析。

sentences.english: How do you respond to India's possible confrontational measures?
sentences.chinese: 印度可能对此采取对抗性措施，中方有何回应？

sentences.english: Without opposable thumbs, or even fingers.
sentences.chinese: 无对抗性竖起大拇指，甚至手指。

sentences.english: I want to play competitive basketball this year.
sentences.chinese: 今年我想要打对抗性强烈的球赛。
